string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item:
216§• Fix issue where songs were not being identified
• Import translations
• Bug fixes

211§• Blacklist some music players
• Improved song recognition
• Bug fixes

209§• Fix YouTube support
• Fix poor synchronization with Spotify and other players (no more hitting \"resync\"!)
• Fix the way the floating window looks on Android 4
• Fix minor crashes & visual bugs

202§• Improve floating lyrics support for YouTube
• Fix issue where connection was impossible on some WiFi networks
• Don't show notifications if we don't have lyrics for a song
• Massive changes to how songs are tracked, improving support for Chinese devices like Huawei phones
• Fix issue where floating lyrics would prevent you from granting permissions to the app
• Fixed some bugs & crashes

192§• Massive improvements to the Floating Lyrics in terms of stability and features. You can now resize the window.
• You can now use QuickLyric with YouTube. Let us know how well it goes!
• Prevent Netflix from interfering with QuickLyric
• Better support for Chinese devices like Huawei, Oppo and Xiaomi
• Better support for songs with partial metadata
• Fix bugs

177§• The notification now disappears when you\'re not listening to music or using QuickLyric (sorry!)
• Prevent ads from showing up too often
• Fix bug where ads were not appearing when they should
• Fix notifications in Android Oreo
• Fix bug where some translations (i.e. French) were not working
173§• Fix issue wbere the floating icon was appearing way too often.

172§• Fixed an issue where the floating lyrics window would be empty
• Synchronized lyrics are now animated
• Improved compatibility with some players
• Fixed some issues that would appear when scanning your music library

170§• QuickLyric can now recognize your music files even if they don\'t have the right metadata! This means you\'ll see a lot less messages telling you the lyrics could not be found.
• Limit how often ads can show up
• Blacklist a couple of podcasts, audiobooks apps
• Fix issue where tracks longer than 20 minutes were always ignored
• Tweak notification channels on Android 8
• Fix issue where the wrong text would sometimes be displayed on screen
• Crash fixes

166§• A free trial for Premium is now available!
• Support for Android 8
• Users can now watch a video ad to remove all ads for a couple of days
• Fix an issue when rotating screen while reading synchronized lyrics
• Some crash fixes

155§• Fixes many crashes
• Fix not being able to romanise Korean lyrics
• Fix not being able to disable synchronized lyrics
• Fix lyrics not being saved automatically when viewed in the overlay
• Enable legacy track detection when everything else fails

153§• Fixes many crashes
• Fixes many issues on Android 4.x and specifically KitKat

152§• Brand new 3.0 releases with tons of new features! Don\'t forget to rate the app, it helps us a lot!
• A lot more lyrics will now be available
• NEW! Romanisation button
• NEW! Floating lyrics
• NEW! Music identification
• NEW! Recent tracks menu
• Fixed bug where switching between players would cause issues in the track detection
• Fix bug where the app would appear to freeze and shutdown
• You can now remove saved lyrics by long pressing them
• Performance improvements, tons of bug fixes
• Translations, submissions and more are coming. You can always email us for assistance and we\'ll get back to you as soon as possible.

145§• Xiaomi/MIUI users are now invited to whitelist the app in System -> Permissions -> Autostart
• The saved lyrics screen now shows dividers to make it more obvious you can delete songs by swiping them

139§• Support for additional music players like Napster
• Crash fixes, bug fixes
• Other Improvements the recovery when the QuickLyric service gets killed (if you had issues where the app wouldn\'t detect your music before this update, please reboot your device)

138§• Handle bug where the Google Play Music scan fails
• Show beautiful material art when no artwork is available
• Fix bug where the app would blink during launch for some users
• Improve the recovery when the QuickLyric service gets killed (if you had issues where the app wouldn\'t detect your music before this update, please reboot your device)

132§• Expanded lyrics catalog thanks to user submissions
• New round icon for supported devices
• The most active users will get a discreet invitation to review the app
• Improved support for opening the app directly from a music player

130§• Huge improvements to the track detection when switching between players
• Fixed the issue where Spotify would send QuickLyric the wrong artwork
• Added artwork detection for KitKat (thanks to Open Source contributor Steve Myers for these!)
• QuickLyric 2.1 is much, much faster and more stable
• Added the groundwork for user-submitted lyrics and user-ratings (this feature will be rolling out progressively)
• Synchronized lyrics are now available for a lot more tracks

128§• Finally fix connection issues for older devices
• Fixed some rare crashes
• Improve performances
• Added an explanation as to why Premium is not available as a one-time purchase

104§• Fix issues with artwork not always appearing
• Fix Search not working
• Fix synchronized lyrics not being on by default
103§• Fix issues for users attempting to buy a subscription

90§• Show copyright and writer credits
• Prevent youtube notifications from triggering notifications
• Fix search bar appearance
• Fix bug for Android Wear users
• Make Android Wear support paid
• Fix issue where the wrong artwork would be displayed
• Crash fixes

89§• New launch screen
• Crash fixes

87§• Adjusted the artwork framing
• Switched to HTTP2 for a faster, better experience
• Made the APK lighter
• Fixed sync issues, crashes and some minor bugs
86§• Fixed a critical bug that broke player compatibility. You may need to restart your device. Apologies for the inconvenience.

85§• Fixed a timing issue with some synchronized lyrics
• Artwork is now being imported from your player instead of being downloaded
• Fixed dialog colors in Night Mode
• Crash fixes and translation import

84§• New strings to be translated (again)
• Pressing back on the saved lyrics screen won\'t close the app anymore
• Improved overall animations
• Fixed a couple of reported crashes

83§• New changelog pop-up dialog
• New strings added on Crowdin
• Enhanced compatibility with players like BlackPlayer or PowerAmp
• Corrected bug where searching lyrics with non-standard characters would cause issues
• Fixed important memory leaks
